name: mmm-infomirror
description: Smart Mirror Module for InfoMirror Project - CE5507 (HC-SR04 & NeoPixel Version)

scripts.install-deps: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y python3-dev python3-pip scons swig
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run: sudo npm install --unsafe-perm if installation fails'

author: InfoMirror Team - CE5507

dependencies.pigpio: Requires pigpio daemon running: sudo systemctl enable pigpiod && sudo systemctl start pigpiod
dependencies.rpi-ws281x-native: Requires root privileges for GPIO access. Install with: sudo npm install --unsafe-perm
dependencies.mcp-spi-adc: Requires SPI enabled: sudo raspi-config -> Interfacing Options -> SPI -> Enable
